revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Rock Peak Ruins |image = [[File:Rock Peak Ruins.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Rock Peak Ruins. |tokens = 1,920,000 |location = Southeast of Giants Bed }}
<!--T:2--> '''Rock Peak Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 31,507,840 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Stonjourner.png|40px]] Stonjourner || rowspan=8 colspan=2| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Rhyperior.png|40px]] Rhyperior |- | [[File:Aggron.png|40px]] Aggron |- | [[File:Coalossal.png|40px]] Coalossal |- | [[File:Barbaracle.png|40px]] Barbaracle |- | [[File:Gigalith.png|40px]] Gigalith |- | [[File:Crustle.png|40px]] Crustle |- | [[File:Aerodactyl.png|40px]] Aerodactyl* |} '''*Note:''' Aerodactyl will only appear if the player has captured it previously.
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Relicanth.png|50px]] Relicanth || <center>149,662,240 || rowspan=2 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Regirock.png|50px]] '''Regirock*''' || <center>157,539,200 |} '''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#The Ancient Golems|The Ancient Golems]] Questline to unlock.
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 37.87% || 36.66% || 31.60% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 37.87% || 36.66% || 31.60% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Brown Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 10.11% || 10.69% || 13.14% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Hard Stone}} || N/A || 1.35% || 1.77% || 3.51% |- | {{Bag2|Everstone}} || N/A || 1.35% || 1.77% || 3.51% |- | {{Bag2|Stone Plate}} || N/A || 1.35% || 1.77% || 3.51% |}
<!--T:9--> {{Galar Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #8 - Galar^a]] </translate>
